name: MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE - THE TERROR
description:
MISSION : IMPOSSIBLE THE TERROR

TO THE MOST SPECIAL AGENT...

MISSION: THE TERROR is to remove the main culprit of the largest biochemical terrorism on the ground. All you have to do, the world's best agent, is to infiltrate the building where the boss is, identify the inside of the building, and remove the boss. To remove the boss, you have to use the special boss killer item. It is time to carry out the mission in earnest. 

Good luck to you.

  • Control the game with the arrow keys or WASD.
  • Interact with red objects as you progress the mission.
